channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Game on Grandparents
channel.desc: Pro gamer Jelly guides the teams through the speedy world of Sonic Superstars. Who will race through the course and cross the finish line first.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: The Next Step
channel.desc: A-Troupe?s latest victory is cut short after an Absolute Dance rules change shakes things up. Now, winning regionals isn?t just about their reputation. It's also about saving the studio.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Pok?mon: Black and White
channel.desc: A vast Pok?mon habitat amid the hustle and bustle of the big city seems like the perfect new home for a group of five Genesect. The arrival of these mythical Pok?mon quickly becomes a problem, though, as their nest threatens the city?s power supply and they keep attacking anyone who approaches it. On top of that, they have attracted the attention of the legendary Pok?mon Mewtwo, who sympathizes with them because its own origins also involve human tampering. Their leader, a red Genesect, doesn?t trust Mewtwo, and their confrontation quickly rages out of control! Can Ash and his friends stop these two powerful Pok?mon before they destroy the city.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
channel.desc: The Lemmings play marbles, and it's driving Grizzy crazy.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Gladiators: Epic Pranks
channel.desc: Nitro pranks Diamond when the guest on a live TV show can?t stop pumping! The other Gladiators have fun behind the scenes, pranking the audience at Sheffield Arena.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Pickle Storm
channel.desc: Pickle Storm and her parents flee the magical land of Kleftania and end up on Earth, where everything is strange and confusing.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Malory Towers
channel.desc: Darrell?s final year starts with a fierce argument with Gwen, but she knows they need to work together. Meanwhile, French student Celeste joins the Third and plays a prank on the teachers.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Jamie Johnson FC
channel.desc: Young footballers Christina and Andrew dream of making it into Hawx United Academy. The odds are stacked against them - until Jamie Johnson decides to get involved.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Deadly 60
channel.desc: Steve heads to Suriname, a country with more forest than anywhere else on earth. He kayaks upriver in search of some deadly critters.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Andy and the Band
channel.desc: Odd Sock Georgia can?t get her PE kit from a strange lost property cupboard at school, so Andy and the Band take on a daring and delicate operation to retrieve it.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Bro's in Control
channel.desc: Little Bro Callum sets Adam and Joe another epic quest: become a king, build the best cardboard castle, and defend your kingdom against the destructive dragon.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Octonauts: Above & Beyond
channel.desc: A honey badger claims a watering hole, so Kwazii challenges her to a digging contest.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Big Lizard
channel.desc: When Dad runs out of marmalade, Big Lizard shows Cosima a plant that's growing Proximan oranges. The leaves turn out to be giant bugs, who aren't happy about sharing their fruit.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Danger Mouse
channel.desc: A late-night scary movie makes Penfold extra jittery, forcing Danger Mouse to make his sidekick sit out the latest mission to stop the Baron from flooding the entire world. When his search for Greenback proves fruitless, things go from bad to worse when Danger Mouse realises that the Baron has headed to the planet's only 100 per cent waterproof building and Penfold's current location - Danger HQ.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Dennis & Gnasher Unleashed!
channel.desc: Pieface's all-time hero, Cherry Bakewell, is coming to Beanotown to judge the annual bake-off. Pieface wants to make the best pie ever and win the competition, but when Dennis discovers Pieface has never actually baked a pie before, he does everything he can to ensure a win, with pie-splattering results.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Super Happy Magic Forest
channel.desc: The heroes are excited to visit Whizzpop?s Pop-Up Bakery and taste his magical cakes, but they are shocked to find that the protein bars have shouty raisins in them, the custard tarts are rock hard, and the floating sponges keep floating away! Trevor quests to solve the mystery, but having accidentally fallen into Whizzpop?s invisibility flour, how on earth will he get everyone?s attention.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Operation Ouch!
channel.desc: Gladiator Dynamite is back to make sure things don?t get too explosive when Dr Dan and Dr Raph get into a Body Battle in a planktastic challenge to test their core muscles. On the basketball court, we meet Joel Henry, our Brilliant Bodies slam-dunk champion, to find out how he jumps so much higher than Dr Chris. It?s game on in the lab when Dr Xand becomes Saliva Man and Dr Chris tries everything he knows to overcome his superpowers as the doctors show us what spit is for. In an amazing Bodytricks, six kids surprise themselves by lifting Dr Ronx off a chair using only two fingers! And in the emergency department in Edinburgh, we follow the treatment of Niamh, who has broken her elbow doing a back handspring at gymnastics, and Adhya, who took a whack on the thumb during a hockey match. Ouch.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Pok?mon Horizons
channel.desc: After rescuing a wild Hatenna, Liko contemplates her own feelings and makes a new friend.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Sketchy Comedy
channel.desc: A bunch of bananas, a door handle, a fridge and a tortilla are among the items get the Sketchy treatment.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: The Deep
channel.desc: Animated series. The Nektons meet online superstar Devil Daniels, who will stop at nothing to reach the fame that he seeks - but can the Nektons protect a creature that he has his sights on in particular.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Dennis & Gnasher Unleashed!
channel.desc: Gnasher is practically immobile inside a full-body cast. When he goes missing, Dennis and the gang race all over Beanotown to find him, always one step behind the helpless hound.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Danger Mouse
channel.desc: Animated series. Danger Mouse is forced to choose between dedication to duty and friendship when he battles the Baron in his underwater Toadlantis base.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Ninja Express
channel.desc: A nightwatchman at a museum is baffled when an Egyptian exhibition keeps moving around, so he asks the Ninjas to deliver a detective who can solve the mystery.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Shaun the Sheep
channel.desc: Bitzer is horrified when the Farmer scribbles all over his map showing the location of his buried bone, fearing he will never rediscover his treasure. The flock are on hand to help him search, even if their methods are unorthodox.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
channel.desc: Grizzy finds a giant home cinema screen.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Boy Girl Dog Cat Mouse Cheese
channel.desc: When a horrible smell ruins everyone's day at the beach, Cheese mistakenly believes she is growing stinky and is too embarrassed to go out.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Super Happy Magic Forest
channel.desc: The heroes and the Council of Happiness swap jobs, and when the council fail in their quest, the whole forest is at risk of being flooded by Stinkystuff.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Odd Squad
channel.desc: The Odd Squad investigates strange events. The agents bring someone with an odd problem back to headquarters.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Odd Squad
channel.desc: The Odd Squad investigates strange events. It's villain report card day at Odd Squad.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Total Dramarama
channel.desc: Beth sets out to get rid of all their old toys, hoping Chef will buy the new toy she wants.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Miraculous: Tales of Ladybug & Cat Noir
channel.desc: The heroes face a jubilating villain.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Pok?mon Horizons
channel.desc: Chairwoman Geeta challenges Liko, Roy and Dot to a battle to test their strength.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Home Sweet Rome
channel.desc: Lucy meets Francesca?s parents and learns more about her family. Kyla teams up with Jimmy.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: The Next Step
channel.desc: Brawl pits Ariana and Michelle against each other as Lucien shakes up regionals rehearsals. Meanwhile, Izzy tries to overcome their dance captain doubts.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Shaun the Sheep
channel.desc: Children's animation. Life on the farm becomes a hive of athletic activity as Shaun and friends stage their very own sporting extravaganza. In heroic style Shaun, Bitzer and friends compete for victory whenever the Farmer's back is turned. A vigorous table tennis match sends Shaun around the world in his attempts to return the ball to his opponent.
